labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The app is translated but the date and time stamps are converted back into English formatting.
data.expected_result: The entire app is translated into Swedish.
data.short_description: After changing the Discord language to "Swedish" and then refreshing the app, date/time stamps are converted to English.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Discord User Settings - Select Locale - Change the language to "Svenska" - CTRL+R
